law.text:
In addition to any other responsibilities for administering the Program, the responsibilities of the Department include:
designing and implementing an ongoing outreach and publicity campaign to achieve the widest possible dissemination of information about the Program to:
potential applicants; and
nutrition advocacy groups in the State;
receiving and reviewing applications for funding; and
allocating funds for approved applications in accordance with this part.
